content: Summarize the lyrics to the song "My Way" by Frank Sinatra.

The song "My Way" by Frank Sinatra is about a person reflecting on their life as they approach its end. The lyrics convey a sense of pride and satisfaction in having lived life on their own terms, facing challenges head-on and making independent choices. The narrator acknowledges both successes and mistakes but emphasizes the importance of staying true to oneself. The overall message is one of self-assurance and fulfillment, having navigated life's journey with authenticity and personal integrity.
